Good Morning, Rachel Green. Welcome to POLKING.

Enter your doubt related to application.
Thank You For Your Feedback. We Are Glad That You Like It.
Thank you for your feedback. We will make the answers more understandable.

Hello Guys, Polking. An android application which will help you to deal with not all but some of the problems you face in your day to day life. Like should I buy this phone, should I rent a home at that place or thaaat place. You want to know what people think about your ideas before going all out. You want to know others thinking also. So that\'s why we build an application where you can have a vote not once in 5 years but many in single day for not a government party but on your daily decisions. Use it to have fun but don\'t hurt others also. Last but not the least, Thank you for downloading our application Polking. Have Fun. If you want you can share this app using the below link to your family, friends and enemies. ;-)
Give Us Your Feedback and We Will Make Sure We Will Change. If not we will bring something new. But change WILL happen.
Very Bad. Uninstalling If You Didn\'t Change This.
Not So Good. Please Fix This.
Some thins need to be change.
Very Good. Everything is working fine.
Say What You Didn\'t Like In Brief:
It\'s Making Us Sad That You Didn\'t Like Our Application. Please Tell Us And We Will Make The Changes As Soon As Possible.
Tell Us What You Want To Change And We Will Make Those Changes.
Tell Us What You Need Us To Change. We Will Give That A Look.
Thanks For Liking Our Application. Any Suggestion?
Thank You Very Much. But I Think You Are Being Modest. Tell us What Changes You Required. Please.
Please LogIn To Give Your Vote. Because We Do Not Support Anonymous Voting Now.
This Application Helps You To Know What Others Think About Your Idea. Not What You Think About Your Own Thinking. So Sorry We Don\'t Work That Way. Sorry.
